byline.contributor: David M. Herszenhorn contributed reporting from Moscow, and Julie Hirschfeld Davis from Washington.

abstract: Military experts and politicians warn that hardening of positions on both sides of Ukrainian conflict with Russia is undermining Minsk peace accord and could lead to another war in the region.
lead_paragraph: A hardening of positions on both sides of the Ukraine conflict is undermining the Minsk peace accord and could lead to another war, military experts and politicians say.

headline.main: Hardening of Positions Undercuts Ukraine Peace Accord
headline.print_headline: Hardening of Positions Undercuts Ukraine Peace Accord

snippet: A hardening of positions on both sides of the Ukraine conflict is undermining the Minsk peace accord and could lead to another war, military experts and politicians say.
